entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High 17.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:31 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
